channel.title: Harbor on NewPlayer
channel.description: Recent content in Harbor on NewPlayer

item.title: 從 Harbor Push / Pull Image
item.description: Push Image 到 Harbor 設定 Docker 為允許非安全連線 (Insecure Registry) Linux 系統操作，編輯 Docker 設定檔 vim /etc/docker/daemon.json 輸入 { "insecure-registries":["<harbor_ip>:<harbor_port>"] } # ex: # { "insecure-registries":["XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX:XXX"] } 儲存並離開: ESC → :wq 重新啟動 Docker: sudo systemctl stop docker sudo systemctl start docker Docker Desktop 操作 點選
